p.span: Thank you for sending us the query.
We would endeavour to come back to you within 48 hours.
Here is the case number assigned to this query : {!Case.CaseNumber}.
For any updates to this particular query, please add it to this same email and forward it to ''businesspartner@auspost.com.au'.

td.style: font:13px Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color:#807370; line-height:16px; padding:11px 0 6px;
